advertiserCountry.description: The name of the country associated with the advertiser.

advertiserIndustry.description: The industry or sector of the advertiser.

budgetAmount.description: Budget amount set by the user. Will be null in case of Pre-Budget scenario.

currencyCode.description: The currency code (e.g., USD, EUR) used for the budget.

flightEndDate.description: The campaign flight end date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

flightStartDate.description: The campaign flight start date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

goalKpi.description: The key performance indicator (KPI) for the campaign.

currencyCode.description: The currency code of the recommended KPI value.

goalKpi.description: The key performance indicator (KPI) for the campaign.

modelBasedRecommendation.description: Boolean value to signify if recommendation was generated by the model or by a heuristic.

RecommendedKpi.description: Nested object that contains the lower and upper bound of the recommendation range.

info.description: Creates a Target KPI recommendation for advertisers when they are in the process of creating a new campaign (ADSP).
info.title: Goal Seeking Bidder Target KPI Recommendation

post.description:
Creates a Target KPI recommendation for advertisers when they are in the process of creating a new campaign (ADSP).

**Authorized resource type**:
DSP Rodeo Entity ID, DSP Advertiser Account ID

**Parameter name**:
Amazon-Ads-AccountId

**Parameter in**:
header

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["campaign_edit"]

parameters.description: The identifier of a client associated with a "Login with Amazon" account.
parameters.name: Amazon-Advertising-API-ClientId

parameters.description: The identifier of a profile associated with the advertiser account. Use `GET` method on Profiles resource to list profiles associated with the access token passed in the HTTP Authorization header and choose profile id `profileId` from the response to pass it as input.
parameters.name: Amazon-Advertising-API-Scope
